Html:
Hello,

I am using php-excel library for multipurpose use .
I am reading xls file using below code

$objPHPExcel = new PHPExcel();
$objReader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel5');
$objPHPExcel = $objReader->load('test1.xls');

$objPHPExcel->setActiveSheetIndex(0);

after same file writing use below code
$objWriter2007 = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel2007($objPHPExcel);
$objWriter2007->save('test2.xlsx');

file writing successfully but new test2.xlsx file not showing dropdown color and dropdown change to color change also not showing.

Could you please help us for?

Thanks,
